Dan

  • A challenge to everyone involved in organising tech events: how can we leverage our many social gatherings for the greater social good? For example, consider the 1:1:1 model in the context of tech events, or even something as simple as donating some of the profits to charity (perhaps to build a well).

entry.title: elasticsearch
entry.content:
Show Date: Tuesday, March 19

In this episode, we sat down with Shay Banon, Karel Minarik, Rashid Khan, and Dan Phrawzty to discuss elasticsearch.

  • Panel
  • Chef News
  • Picks
  • Download
    • Audio
    • Video Stream

Watch Now

Panel

  • Shay Banon twitter
  • Karel Minarik github, twitter, irc: karmi
  • Rashid Khan github, twitter irc: rashidkpc
  • Dan Phrawzty github, twitter, irc: phrawzty, blog
  • John Vincent, aka Lusis twitter, github
  • Bryan Berry github, twitter, irc: bryanwb, blog: devopsanywhere
  • Brandon Burton github, twitter
  • Nathen Harvey github, twitter, irc: nathenharvey, blog

Chef News

  • Vote for awesome community chefs!
  • Update on #ChefConf
    • Workshops on Wednesday
    • Hack Day on Saturday
    • Get you travel and tickets arranged now!
  • test-kitchen runs in 20s w/ LXC on AWS, according to @fujin, it's some next-level shhhtuff
  • subscribe to the "What's Cookin" newsletter

In other news, Bryan is about to start a new job at Cycle Computing
